summary: Cincinnati, nicknamed Cincy, is a city in Ohio, United States. It's the third-largest city in Ohio and the 64th largest in the U.S. Located where the Licking and Ohio rivers meet, it was settled in 1788 and grew as a shipping hub. With a population of over 300,000, it's a cultural and economic center. Known for its architecture, it was once called the "Paris of America." Cincinnati is home to several big companies, professional sports teams, and the University of Cincinnati. It's also where President William Howard Taft was born. Today, it's considered one of the best places to live in the U.S.
title: Cincinnati
